textBox.richText: I have a storage unit full of curriculum, teaching tips, classroom management and readings from teaching World History. I am putting here (it will take time) all the items that are free to use that I think would be of use to others teaching world history. Where there is credit given to the author, please leave it there. If I have failed to give credit and you know the original author, please let me know so that I can correct it. Downloads for Teachers New items added today: Grade Update Contract 1 Grade Update Contract 2 Good Teaching - Haberman Language Strategies for Groupwork Learning Pyramid Importance of Student Status - NYT Seven Levels of Questioning Multiple Abilities List Multiple Abilities Bingo Get-To-Know-You Bingo Road to Democracy Activity
